title: All's Fair: Kim Kardashian & Glenn Close in Ryan Murphy's Cutthroat Divorce Lawyer Drama
shortdescription: Kim K goes full attorney mode in the fiercest, glossiest legal series of the year.
author: TV Insider

content.content: /images/All's Fair Kim Kardashian & Glenn Close in Ryan Murphy's.webp

Ryan Murphy has done it again. All’s Fair — his new Hulu legal drama about the most ruthless all-female divorce firm in Los Angeles — just dropped its first three episodes, and the internet is losing its mind.

Kim Kardashian plays Victoria Steele, a junior attorney clawing her way to the top under Glenn Close’s ice-queen patriarch Diane Lockhart-style mentor. Halle Berry, Naomi Watts, and Sarah Paulson round out the killer ensemble.

Critics are stunned: Variety says Kardashian “holds her own against Close in scenes that crackle with tension,” while Vulture declared, “She’s giving full Elle Woods meets Miranda Priestly — and it works.”
